item.title: ---->help<---
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

well i was told this is how to add autocast…

[quote=“0wned_Pl0x”]Declare a void like this

public void autoCastBarrage() { hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(20); inCombat(); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(369); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; stillgfx(368, absY, absX); }

Now look for

public int GetWepAnim()

Add this in there

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // ancient staff { autoCastBarrage(); return 1979; }[/quote]

well, i did all that but when i equip ancient staff, when you click “choose spell” it goes to modern magic, not ancients…how do i make it so that when you click choose spell, the ancient spells come up instead?BTW its a czar base

Read full topic
